summary: This bill, the Ensuring Accountability and Dignity in Government Contracting Act of 2025, amends the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013 to enhance efforts to combat human trafficking in government contracting. It mandates incident reporting by recipients, requires the Inspector General to investigate reported activities, and clarifies remedial actions. The bill also directs the Office of Management and Budget to report on the feasibility of improving contractor compliance, streamlining reporting, and tracking anti-trafficking training for contracting personnel.
